comprehensive_overview: Mozilla Firefox, commonly known as Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, Mozilla Corporation. It is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, and mobile devices. Firefox focuses on privacy, speed, and customization.
core_features: Highly customizable with add-ons and themes
Enhanced privacy features like tracking protection
Built-in password manager and popup blocker
Frequent updates for security and performance improvements
